text.div:
Which date/time qualifier

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
ANY Any date/time within a rangedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
CAN Cancellation date/timedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.3
COL Collection date/time, equivalent to film or sample collection date/timedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
ORD Order date/timedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
RCT Specimen receipt date/time, receipt of specimen in filling ancillary (Lab)deprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
REP Report date/time, report date/time at filling ancillary (i.e., Lab)deprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
SCHED Schedule date/timedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6

name: v2 Which date/time qualifier
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0156 ( Which date/time qualifier)
